formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: Adapt the handling of the Generation of multi-named functions during the GenLLVM pass to handle the multiple names, which currently it fails with a VALUE ERROR .

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: The cause of this problem is that we had a shy result being returned by the GenFunc function, which apparently does not work well in places where a normal value is expected. This appeared to work during our initial investigations, but removing the shy value fixes this problem. Some investigation is worthwhile, so this is being sent to Dyalog to understand better why this error occurs.
